description: Ensuring customer satisfaction, retention, and value realization through support and success management

typical_processes.name: Support Triage & Intent Routing
typical_processes.description: Receiving, categorizing, and routing customer support requests

typical_processes.name: Agent Assistance & Escalation Management
typical_processes.description: Resolving customer issues with agent support and escalations

typical_processes.name: Self-Service & Knowledge Base Management
typical_processes.description: Maintaining knowledge base and self-service resources

typical_processes.name: Account Health & Churn Prevention
typical_processes.description: Monitoring account health and preventing churn

common_outputs.name: Resolved Support Tickets (Customer Success)
common_outputs.description: Customer issues that have been investigated and resolved
common_pain_points: Resolution time is too long (SLA breaches)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train agents on products, hire senior support staff, implement QA program
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered answer suggestions, automated ticket routing, chatbots, sentiment detection
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize resolution procedures, build comprehensive knowledge base, implement tier structure

common_outputs.name: Account Health Scores
common_outputs.description: Scores indicating the health and risk level of customer accounts
common_pain_points: Health scores are inaccurate (don't predict churn)
Can't identify at-risk accounts early enough
No clear action plan for red accounts

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train CSMs on health score interpretation, hire data analyst
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered churn prediction, automated health scoring, early warning system
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize health score methodology, implement intervention playbooks

common_outputs.name: Knowledge Base Articles
common_outputs.description: Self-service documentation and help articles for customers
common_pain_points: No process for keeping KB updated

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire knowledge manager, train agents on article writing
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered article suggestions, automated article generation, intelligent search
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement article lifecycle management, regular content audits, usage analytics

common_outputs.name: Customer Support Responses
common_outputs.description: Replies and communications sent to customers regarding their issues
common_pain_points: Response quality varies widely by agent
Responses are too slow (hours or days)
Responses don't fully address the issue
Agents spend too long crafting responses

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train agents on communication, implement QA reviews
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI response suggestions, automated translation, sentiment-aware responses, response templates
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize response templates, implement peer review, define tone guidelines

common_outputs.name: Churn Risk Alerts
common_outputs.description: Notifications identifying accounts at risk of churning
common_pain_points: No context on why account is at risk
Can't prioritize which accounts to save

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train CSMs on intervention strategies, hire retention specialist
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered churn prediction, root cause analysis, intervention recommendations
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Define intervention playbooks, implement escalation paths, track save rates

common_outputs.name: Support Performance Metrics
common_outputs.description: KPIs tracking support team performance (CSAT, FRT, resolution time, etc.)
common_pain_points: Can't drill down into root causes
Metrics don't align with customer experience

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train team on metrics interpretation, hire support analyst
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Real-time dashboards, automated reporting, predictive analytics, benchmarking
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize metric definitions, implement regular reviews, link metrics to incentives
